high_descs: Turn right, walk to the wall, turn right again, walk to the mirror, then turn right again to face the side of the chair.
Pick up the cell phone that is sitting on the chair.
Turn right, walk a few steps, turn left, walk forward a bit, then turn left to face the desk.
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a cell phone using the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn right and walk towards the wall, the hang a right and walk over to the side of the chair.
Pick up the phone off of the seat of the chair.
Turn right and walk forward, then hang a left and walk over to the left side of the wooden desk.
Turn on the small lamp on the wooden desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a phone in the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Turn around, go toward the door and then turn right to face the chair.
Pick up the phone on the chair.
Go around the front of the chair to the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine the phone with light of the lamp.
